page.title: 05Longfield Hill Women's Inst.
page.content: Meetings of Longfield Hill Women's Institute consist of a business section where forthcoming activities and plans are discussed; a break for tea ,cake and chat; finally a Speaker. During 1985 there have been talks on Local History by a local resident who is a member of the College of Heralds; Life in a Sheltered Housing Complex; slides of a walk from Bees Head to Robin Hood's Bay; a local poet who wrote a poem about the club; a speaker from the Wild Life Preservation of Plants; the Orchard Theatre,Dartford; and a talk called "Music is Fun".Every year a charity is supported-this year funds are being raised for the new County Headquarters Fund,and clothing has been knitted for the famine victims in Ethiopia.
